#A manuell or briefe volume of controuersies of religion betweene the Protestants and the Papists wherein the arguments of both sides are briefely set downe, and the aduersaries sophismes are plainely refuted. Written in Latine in a briefe and perspicuous method by Lucas Osiander, and now Englished with some additions and corrections. Enchiridion controversiarum. English#

##Osiander, Lucas, 1571-1638.##
A manuell or briefe volume of controuersies of religion betweene the Protestants and the Papists wherein the arguments of both sides are briefely set downe, and the aduersaries sophismes are plainely refuted. Written in Latine in a briefe and perspicuous method by Lucas Osiander, and now Englished with some additions and corrections.
Enchiridion controversiarum. English
Osiander, Lucas, 1571-1638.

    _ CHAP. 16. Of the adoration, incluſion, and carying about of the Euchariſt: as alſo of the Sacraments out of their vſe.
